mapper.select: select brbrno from beers_brand where beers_brand.brbrnm = #{brand}
select scno from beers_sub_cate where beers_sub_cate.scnm = #{subcate}
select ctryno from beers_ctry where beers_ctry.ctry = #{ctry}
select cono from beers_comp where beers_comp.comp = #{comp}
select brbrno from beers_brand where beers_brand.brbrnm = #{search}
select scno from beers_sub_cate where beers_sub_cate.scnm = #{search}
mapper.insert: insert into beers(scno, brbrno, ctryno, cono, br_desc, achl) values(#{scno}, #{brbrno}, #{ctryno}, #{cono}, #{describe}, #{alchol})
mapper.select: select scno, scnm, mcnm from beers_sub_cate inner join beers_main_cate on beers_sub_cate.mcno = beers_main_cate.mcno where beers_sub_cate.mcno = 1
select scno, scnm, mcnm from beers_sub_cate inner join beers_main_cate on beers_sub_cate.mcno = beers_main_cate.mcno where beers_sub_cate.mcno = 2
select scno, scnm, mcnm from beers_sub_cate inner join beers_main_cate on beers_sub_cate.mcno = beers_main_cate.mcno where beers_sub_cate.mcno = 3

select * from beers inner join beers_brand on beers.brbrno = beers_brand.brbrno inner join beers_sub_cate on beers.scno = beers_sub_cate.scno inner join beers_ctry on beers.ctryno = beers_ctry.ctryno inner join beers_comp on beers.cono = beers_comp.cono where beers.scno = #{no}
